title: The "New" Morgana
body:
Rioters please take a moment to read this I implore you,

As a Morgana main for the past 3 seasons, I have always enjoyed the competition in the mid lane until recently. With the slight rework to Morgana taking her from being my safest blind pick option into super god mode with the 40% healing to being what she is today with 20% on champions, cannon minions and jungle creeps, I now find her to be lacking in comparison to her before the slight rework. I have accrued 1.5 mil mastery points on her since its inception and had a rather steady win rate of ~60% through the 3 seasons. The rework hit and initially shot me through the roof I was over 75%! She clearly was broken with 40% to champs and needed something done about it. But rather than taking her to 20% to champs can we not just revert her back to before the rework? I use to have 20% spell vamp to everything now just to champs it has taken my 60% and dropped me to under 55%. I seem to be about the only person who sees the new kit as being a rather harsh nerf to what she had prior to reworking. I have currently stopped playing Morgana in any solo lane other than being a counter pick I now no longer feel like her black shield is enough to warrant her being a blind pick. I stand firm in my belief that if she were just reverted back to her pre rework kit she would fall right back into a comfortable slot of being viable. Thanks again for your time and consideration, have an outstanding day.

Bentage
Misses His Morgana

replies.body: Eh I like this new passive healing better, cause I believe it is not cut to 1/3 effectiveness for her W and Ult. While you heal from less sources it feels you heal way more anyways
Funny how riot builds her up only to deceptively tear her down. Funny how a rioter said they'd prefer Morgana to never get played mid do to her kit.
Isn't her overall win rate higher then it was pre-rework+post nerf though?

I'm enjoying playing Morgana mid more than ever since the rework.

than*

You cant find a better example of pure condensed incompetence from the game devs then what they did to this girl.

"Hey guys we're going to take some power out of Morgana's laning phase so that we can put her in the jungle!"

"Hey guys we dont like that Morgana is a strong jungler so we're going to nerf her out of it."

. . .

They never said anything about her jungling. The entire point was to make her midlane better.

But yeah sure whatever.
Also her laning phase is massively more powerful. It's only weaker if you take unnecessary poke and only w minions.

I personally enjoyed Morgana mid because she was a safe pushing champion, one of the few that still existed.  With all the mobility and aggressive junglers I don't feel comfortable playing my old pushers (like xerath) without knowing most of the enemy team so it was nice to be able to blind pick Morgana mid and be able to run a push strategy.

Since the changes I don't feel as comfortable playing her mid though.  A big part of her power was the constant sustain from pushing waves, but now if she wants to heal she has to focus champions which means she can't push the minion wave.  I definitely understand the reason for the change but despite Riot saying it was supposed to help make her more viable as a midlaner without impacting support I feel weaker in Mid lane now.

Understand the changes?

ADCs heal way more than morg passively and where is that nerf. They also get heals from supports and relic with little enemy interaction. 

Seems to me that riot was looking for something to change and settled on the first thing they saw.

I am honestly unsure what you are talking about.  At no point was I talking about ADC's or the impact of the changes on support Morgana.  It was purely on Mid lane Morgana and how her sustain while pushing waves got nerfed, resulting in her having to spend abilities on pushing the wave or on trying to sustain off enemy champions.

The healing is perhaps the least important part of her rework.

The w CD reduction had a massively higher impact on her power. 

Shit's bonkers.
Isnt she the next champion they will rework?

It is possible I am just in a preseason slump or maybe I have just plateaued and am playing against strong opponents.  Regardless I still feel like her kit was better before and that she did not need to be retooled or reworked.  She was an untouched little gem in the mid lane for me for many years and I sincerely want her reverted.
